channel.title: ubuntu 12.04 on Bikulov Octonotes
channel.description: Recent content in ubuntu 12.04 on Bikulov Octonotes

item.title: Creating Zip With VPN Client Keys and Configuration Files
item.description: Depends on server configuration, each OpenVPN client needs configuration file (client.conf for *nix and client.ovpn for windows), certificate authority (ca.crt), [optional] tls auth file (ta.key), user crt and key.

item.title: Get rid of Desktop window while launching Nautilus in i3
item.description: In i3 window manager by default Nautilus actually opens two windows: Desktop window and Nautilus itself. The former can’t be closed by the default shortcut $Mod+Shift+Q.

item.title: Setting up RhodeCode on Ubuntu 12.04
item.description: This howto is based on a great guide with modifications. All settings are made for server domain hg.kenarius.org. You can replace it with your one easily.

item.title: Fixing missing icons in PCManFM
item.description: After moving to i3 I’ve installed PCManFM as GUI file manager. To fix missing icons one have to define icon theme. These instructions are tested on Ubuntu 12.04, but it must work with other distros.
